org.myrobotlab.speech

Class NewGrammarDialogNodeBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.myrobotlab.speech.NewGrammarDialogNodeBehavior

  • public class NewGrammarDialogNodeBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
    A Dialog node behavior that loads a completely new grammar upon entry into the node
